--- PAGE 1 ---
Date: 07/03/2025 CIR: 1844114     Inspection Page 1 of 8 
 
Vestas Wind Systems A/S - Hedeager 42 - DK-8200 Aarhus N. Denmark - www.vestas.com 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Created By: gulod 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
Component Inspection Report

Component Type: General 
Report Type: Inspection 
 
Version:  v9 
 
 
 
Copyright Notice

All rights reserved. No part of the documents may be reproduced or copied in any form or by any means—such as graphic, electronic, or

Wind Systems A/S. You may not alter or remove any trademark, copyright or other notice from the documents. The documents are provided 
“as is” and Vestas Wind Systems A/S shall not have any responsibility or liability whatsoever for the results of use of the documents by you.

--- PAGE 3 ---
Date: 07/03/2025 CIR: 1844114     Inspection Page 3 of 8 
 
Vestas Wind Systems A/S - Hedeager 42 - DK-8200 Aarhus N. Denmark - www.vestas.com 
 
Action to be performed on 
component No further action required 
SBU Recommendation 
10/06/2025-EEAFN.The CIR has been reviewed and 
linked to CIM 6007. You can also check the batteries us-
ing VGA guide for alarm 2674 - UPS battery error (KK 
UPS) - V105 V112 V117 V126 V136 V150 V155 3,3-
4,2MW MK3. Replace the Battery Pack for the UPS, if 
tests fail or indication of diminished capacity is present. If 
1 battery is reading significantly lower than the other, re-
place the pack. 
No futher action requerid. 
Defect part has already been 
replaced No 
Follow up notification al-
ready created No 
 
 
General Component Data 
Component group Electrical: Other 
Component Type Battery UPS ++06 
Position of failed item UPS 230V 
Component Manufacturer KK WIND SOLUTIONS 
 
Component Serial Number Vestas Unique Identifier
